translations.idiomatic: Therefore the emperor ordered Fenggao to build a Mingtang on the Wen, like the diagram Gong Yu brought.

sentences.zh: 及五年修封，則祠太一、五帝於明堂上坐，令高皇帝祠坐對之。

translations.literal: Reached five years repaired feng, then sacrificed Taiyi, Five Emperors at Mingtang upper seat, ordered Gao Huangdi spirit tablet seat oppose it.
translations.idiomatic: When the fifth year came and he performed the feng, he sacrificed to Taiyi and the Five Emperors at the upper seat of the Mingtang, and had Gao Huangdi's spirit tablet placed opposite them.

sentences.zh: 祠后土於下房，以二十太牢。

translations.literal: Sacrificed Hou Tu at lower chamber, with twenty great livestock.
translations.idiomatic: He sacrificed to Hou Tu in the lower chamber, with twenty great sets of livestock.

sentences.zh: 天子從昆侖道入，始拜明堂如郊禮。

translations.literal: Emperor from Kunlun way entered, began worship Mingtang like suburban ritual.
translations.idiomatic: The emperor entered by the Kunlun way, and began the worship of the Mingtang like the suburban ritual.

sentences.zh: 禮畢，燎堂下。

translations.literal: Ritual complete, lit fire hall below.
translations.idiomatic: When the ritual was complete, he lit the fire below the hall.

sentences.zh: 而上又上泰山，自有祕祠其巔。

translations.literal: And emperor also ascended Taishan, self had secret sacrifice its peak.
translations.idiomatic: And the emperor also ascended Taishan, and had his own secret sacrifice at its peak.

sentences.zh: 而泰山下祠五帝，各如其方，黃帝并赤帝，而有司侍祠焉。

translations.literal: And Taishan below sacrificed Five Emperors, each like their direction, Huangdi combined Chidi, and officials attended sacrifice there.
translations.idiomatic: And at the foot of Taishan they sacrificed to the Five Emperors, each according to their direction, with Huangdi combined with Chidi, and the officials attended the sacrifices.

sentences.zh: 山上舉火，下悉應之。

translations.literal: Mountain above raised fire, below all responded it.
translations.idiomatic: On the mountain they lit fires, and below they all responded.

sentences.zh: 其後二歲，十一月甲子朔旦冬至，推歷者以本統。

translations.literal: Its after two years, eleventh month jiazi first day dawn winter solstice, calendar calculators with original system.
translations.idiomatic: Two years later, on the jiazi day of the eleventh month at dawn of the winter solstice, the calendar calculators used the original system.

sentences.zh: 天子親至泰山，以十一月甲子朔旦冬至日祠上帝明堂，毋修封禪。

translations.literal: Emperor personally arrived Taishan, with eleventh month jiazi first day dawn winter solstice day sacrificed Supreme God Mingtang, not repaired feng shan.
translations.idiomatic: The emperor personally went to Taishan, and on the jiazi day of the eleventh month at dawn of the winter solstice, sacrificed to the Supreme God in the Mingtang, without performing the feng and shan.

sentences.zh: 其贊饗曰：「天增授皇帝太元神策，周而復始。

translations.literal: Its praise feast said: 'Heaven additionally bestows emperor Taiyuan divine strategy, cycles and begins again.'
translations.idiomatic: The zanshang said: 'Heaven additionally bestows upon the emperor the divine strategy of Taiyuan, cycling and beginning again.'

sentences.zh: 皇帝敬拜太一。」

translations.literal: Emperor reverent bows Taiyi.'
translations.idiomatic: The emperor reverently worships Taiyi.'

sentences.zh: 東至海上，考入海及方士求神者，莫驗，然益遣，冀遇之。

translations.literal: East arrived seacoast, investigated entered sea and fangshi sought gods ones, none verified, yet increasingly sent, hoped encounter them.
translations.idiomatic: He went east to the seacoast, investigated those who entered the sea and fangshi who sought gods, none proved effective, yet he sent even more, hoping to encounter them.

sentences.zh: 十一月乙酉，柏梁災。

translations.literal: Eleventh month yiyou, Bo Liang disaster.
translations.idiomatic: On the yiyou day of the eleventh month, the Bo Liang suffered disaster.

sentences.zh: 十二月甲午朔，上親禪高里，祠后土。

translations.literal: Twelfth month jiawu first day, emperor personally shan Gao Li, sacrificed Hou Tu.
translations.idiomatic: In the twelfth month on the jiawu first day, the emperor personally performed the shan at Gao Li, sacrificing to Hou Tu.

sentences.zh: 臨勃海，將以望祀蓬萊之屬，冀至殊廷焉。

translations.literal: Faced Bohai Sea, will with gaze sacrifice Penglai kind, hoped reach exceptional courts there.
translations.idiomatic: Facing the Bohai Sea, intending to gaze and sacrifice to Penglai and the like, hoping to reach the exceptional courts.

sentences.zh: 上還，以柏梁災故，朝受計甘泉。

translations.literal: Emperor returned, with Bo Liang disaster reason, court received accounts Ganyuquan.
translations.idiomatic: The emperor returned, because of the Bo Liang disaster, and received the accounts in audience at Ganyuquan.

sentences.zh: 公孫卿曰：「黃帝就青靈臺，十二日燒，黃帝乃治明廷。

translations.literal: Gongsun Qing said: 'Yellow Emperor approached Qingling Terrace, twelve days burned, Yellow Emperor then built Mingting.'
translations.idiomatic: Gongsun Qing said: 'The Yellow Emperor approached the Qingling Terrace, burned for twelve days, then the Yellow Emperor built the Mingting.'

sentences.zh: 明廷，甘泉也。」

translations.literal: Mingting, Ganyuquan also.'
translations.idiomatic: Mingting is Ganyuquan.'

sentences.zh: 方士多言古帝王有都甘泉者。

translations.literal: Fangshi many spoke ancient emperors kings had capital Ganyuquan ones.
translations.idiomatic: Fangshi often said that ancient emperors and kings had capitals at Ganyuquan.

sentences.zh: 其後天子又朝諸侯甘泉，甘泉作諸侯邸。

translations.literal: Its after emperor again court feudal lords Ganyuquan, Ganyuquan made feudal lords lodges.
translations.idiomatic: Thereafter the emperor again held audiences for the feudal lords at Ganyuquan, and Ganyuquan built lodges for the feudal lords.

sentences.zh: 勇之乃曰：「越俗有火災，復起屋必以大，用勝服之。」

translations.literal: Yong Zhi then said: 'Yue customs have fire disasters, again raise houses must with large, use conquer subdue it.'
translations.idiomatic: Yong Zhi then said: 'Yue customs have fire disasters, when rebuilding houses they must make them large, using size to conquer and subdue it.'

sentences.zh: 於是作建章宮，度為千門萬戶。

translations.literal: Therefore made Jianzhang Palace, measured as thousand gates ten thousand rooms.
translations.idiomatic: He then built the Jianzhang Palace, designed with a thousand gates and ten thousand rooms.

sentences.zh: 前殿度高未央。

translations.literal: Front hall measured high Weiyang.
translations.idiomatic: The front hall measured higher than the Weiyang.

sentences.zh: 其東則鳳闕，高二十餘丈。

translations.literal: Its east then Feng Tower, high twenty remaining zhang.
translations.idiomatic: To the east stood the Feng Tower, towering over twenty zhang.

sentences.zh: 其西則唐中，數十里虎圈。

translations.literal: Its west then Tang Center, several ten li tiger enclosure.
translations.idiomatic: To the west lay the Tang Center, with tiger enclosures spanning dozens of li.

sentences.zh: 其北治大池，漸臺高二十餘丈，命曰太液池，中有蓬萊、方丈、瀛洲、壺梁，象海中神山龜魚之屬。

translations.literal: Its north managed great pool, Jian Terrace high twenty remaining zhang, named said Taiye Pool, middle had Penglai, Fangzhang, Yingzhou, Hu Liang, imitated sea middle divine mountains turtle fish kind.
translations.idiomatic: To the north, a vast pool was dug, with Jian Terrace rising over twenty zhang, named Taiye Pool, containing Penglai, Fangzhang, Yingzhou, and Hu Liang, imitating the divine mountains, turtles, and fish in the sea.

sentences.zh: 其南有玉堂、璧門、大鳥之屬。

translations.literal: Its south had Jade Hall, Jade Gate, great bird kind.
translations.idiomatic: To the south were the Jade Hall, Jade Gate, and large bird structures.

sentences.zh: 乃立神明臺、井幹樓，度五十丈，輦道相屬焉。

translations.literal: Then erected Shenming Terrace, Jinggan Tower, measured fifty zhang, carriage roads mutually connected there.
translations.idiomatic: He then built the Shenming Terrace and Jinggan Tower, measuring fifty zhang, with carriage roads connecting them.

sentences.zh: 夏，漢改歷，以正月為歲首，而色上黃，官名更印章以五字，為太初元年。

translations.literal: Summer, Han changed calendar, with first month as year beginning, and color honored yellow, official names changed seals with five characters, made Tai Chu first year.
translations.idiomatic: In summer, Han changed the calendar, taking the first month as the beginning of the year, and the color honored yellow, official names and seals changed to five characters, making it the first year of Tai Chu.

sentences.zh: 是歲，西伐大宛。

translations.literal: This year, west attacked Dayuan.
translations.idiomatic: That year, he attacked Dayuan to the west.

sentences.zh: 蝗大起。

translations.literal: Locusts greatly arose.
translations.idiomatic: Locusts arose in great numbers.

sentences.zh: 丁夫人、雒陽虞初等以方祠詛匈奴、大宛焉。

translations.literal: Ding Furen, Luoyang Yu Chu equal with fangshi sacrificed cursed Xiongnu, Dayuan there.
translations.idiomatic: Ding Furen, Luoyang Yu Chu and others used fangshi methods to sacrifice and curse the Xiongnu and Dayuan.

translations.idiomatic: The next year, the officials submitted a memorial saying that the Yong Five Altars lacked mature livestock sets, and the fragrances were not complete.

sentences.zh: 乃令祠官進畤犢牢具，色食所勝，而以木禺馬代駒焉。

translations.literal: Then ordered sacrifice officials advance altar calf livestock sets, colored foods conquer, and with wooden figurine horses replace colts there.
translations.idiomatic: He then ordered the sacrifice officials to advance calf livestock sets to the altars, colored foods that conquer, and to use wooden figurine horses to replace colts.

sentences.zh: 獨五月嘗駒，行親郊用駒。

translations.literal: Only fifth month tasted colts, performed personal suburban used colts.
translations.idiomatic: Only in the fifth month they tasted colts, and when performing the personal suburban sacrifice they used colts.

sentences.zh: 及諸名山川用駒者，悉以木禺馬代。

translations.literal: Reached all famous mountains rivers used colts ones, all with wooden figurine horses replaced.
translations.idiomatic: And for all the famous mountains and rivers that used colts, all were replaced with wooden figurine horses.

sentences.zh: 行過，乃用駒。

translations.literal: Travel passed, then used colts.
translations.idiomatic: When traveling past, then they used colts.

sentences.zh: 他禮如故。

translations.literal: Other rituals like former.
translations.idiomatic: Other rituals remained unchanged.

sentences.zh: 其明年，東巡海上，考神僊之屬，未有驗者。

translations.literal: The next year, east toured seacoast, examined divine immortals kind, not had verified ones.
translations.idiomatic: The next year, he toured the eastern seacoast, examining divine immortals and the like, but found none who proved effective.

sentences.zh: 方士有言「黃帝時為五城十二樓，以候神人於執期，命曰迎年」。

translations.literal: Fangshi had words 'Yellow Emperor time made five cities twelve towers, to await divine people at Zhichi, named said Yingnian.'
translations.idiomatic: Fangshi said: 'The Yellow Emperor made five cities and twelve towers to await divine beings at Zhichi, naming it Yingnian.'

sentences.zh: 上許作之如方，命曰明年。

translations.literal: Emperor approved made it like fangshi, named said Mingnian.
translations.idiomatic: The emperor approved building it as described, naming it Mingnian.

sentences.zh: 上親禮祠上帝焉。

translations.literal: Emperor personally performed rites sacrificed Supreme God there.
translations.idiomatic: The emperor personally performed the rites and sacrificed to the Supreme God there.

sentences.zh: 公玊帶曰：「黃帝時雖封泰山，然風后、封巨、岐伯令黃帝封東泰山，禪凡山，合符，然後不死焉。」

translations.literal: Gong Yu said: 'Yellow Emperor time although feng Taishan, yet Feng Hou, Feng Ju, Qi Bo made Yellow Emperor feng East Taishan, shan Fan Mountain, united tallies, then not died there.'
translations.idiomatic: Gong Yu said: 'Although the Yellow Emperor performed feng on Taishan, Feng Hou, Feng Ju, and Qi Bo made the Yellow Emperor perform feng on East Taishan, shan on Fan Mountain, unite the tallies, and then he did not die.'

sentences.zh: 天子既令設祠具，至東泰山，［東］泰山卑小，不稱其聲，乃令祠官禮之，而不封禪焉。

translations.literal: Emperor already ordered set sacrificial offerings, arrived East Taishan, East Taishan low small, not matched its reputation, then ordered sacrifice officials performed rites it, and not feng shan there.
translations.idiomatic: The emperor having ordered the sacrificial offerings prepared, arrived at East Taishan, but East Taishan was low and small, not matching its reputation, so he ordered the sacrifice officials to perform rites there, but did not perform feng and shan.

sentences.zh: 其後令帶奉祠候神物。

translations.literal: Its after ordered Gong Yu maintained sacrifices awaited divine beings.
translations.idiomatic: Thereafter he ordered Gong Yu to maintain the sacrifices and await divine beings.

sentences.zh: 夏，遂還泰山，修五年之禮如前，而加以禪祠石閭。

translations.literal: Summer, then returned Taishan, repaired five years rituals like before, and added shan sacrifice Shilu.
translations.idiomatic: In summer, he then returned to Taishan, performed the five-year rituals as before, and added the shan sacrifice at Shilu.

sentences.zh: 石閭者，在泰山下阯南方，方士多言此僊人之閭也，故上親禪焉。

translations.literal: Shilu was, at Taishan lower foot southern, fangshi many said this immortals gate also, therefore emperor personally shan there.
translations.idiomatic: Shilu is located south of the base of Taishan; fangshi often said this was the gate of immortals, so the emperor personally performed shan there.

sentences.zh: 其後五年，復至泰山修封。

translations.literal: Its after five years, again arrived Taishan repaired feng.
translations.idiomatic: Five years later, he again went to Taishan to perform the feng.

sentences.zh: 還過祭恒山。

translations.literal: Returned passed sacrificed Hengshan.
translations.idiomatic: On the return, he passed by and sacrificed to Hengshan.

sentences.zh: 今天子所興祠，太一、后土，三年親郊祠，建漢家封禪，五年一修封。

translations.literal: Now emperor established sacrifices, Taiyi, Hou Tu, three years personally suburban sacrificed, established Han house feng shan, five years once repaired feng.
translations.idiomatic: Now the sacrifices established by the emperor are Taiyi and Hou Tu; every three years he personally performs the suburban sacrifice, established the Han house feng and shan, every five years repairs the feng.

sentences.zh: 薄忌太一及三一、冥羊、馬行、赤星，五，寬舒之祠官以歲時致禮。

translations.literal: Bo Ji Taiyi and Three Ones, Dark Sheep, Horse Travel, Red Star, five, Kuan Shu sacrifice officials with seasons performed rites.
translations.idiomatic: The sacrifice officials of Bo Ji for Taiyi and the Three Ones, Dark Sheep, Horse Travel, and Red Star - five in total - Kuan Shu perform rites according to the seasons.

sentences.zh: 凡六祠，皆太祝領之。

translations.literal: Altogether six sacrifices, all Grand Officiant led them.
translations.idiomatic: All six sacrifices are led by the Grand Officiant.

sentences.zh: 至如八神諸神，明年、凡山他名祠，行過則祠，行去則已。

translations.literal: As for Eight Gods various gods, Mingnian, Fanshan other named sacrifices, traveled past then sacrificed, traveled away then stopped.
translations.idiomatic: As for the Eight Gods and various other gods, Mingnian, Fanshan and other named sacrifices, when traveling past they sacrifice, when leaving they stop.

sentences.zh: 方士所興祠，各自主，其人終則已，祠官不主。

translations.literal: Fangshi established sacrifices, each self managed, their person ended then stopped, sacrifice officials not managed.
translations.idiomatic: Sacrifices established by fangshi are each managed by themselves; when the person dies, they stop; the sacrifice officials do not manage them.

sentences.zh: 他祠皆如其故。

translations.literal: Other sacrifices all like their former.
translations.idiomatic: Other sacrifices all remain as before.

sentences.zh: 今上封禪，其後十二歲而還，遍於五岳、四瀆矣。

translations.literal: Now emperor feng shan, its after twelve years then returned, covered Five Peaks, Four Rivers already.
translations.idiomatic: The current emperor's feng and shan, twelve years later he returned, having covered all the Five Peaks and Four Rivers.

sentences.zh: 而方士之候祠神人，入海求蓬萊，終無有驗。

translations.literal: And fangshi awaited sacrificed divine people, entered sea sought Penglai, end none had verification.
translations.idiomatic: And the fangshi who awaited and sacrificed to divine beings, entered the sea seeking Penglai, in the end had no verification.

sentences.zh: 而公孫卿之候神者，猶以大人之跡為解，無有效。

translations.literal: And Gongsun Qing awaited gods ones, still with giant footprints as explanation, none had effect.
translations.idiomatic: And Gongsun Qing who awaited divine beings still explained away the giant footprints, but had no effectiveness.

sentences.zh: 天子益怠厭方士之怪迂語矣，然羈縻不絕，冀遇其真。

translations.literal: Emperor increasingly grew weary disliked fangshi strange circuitous words already, yet restrained not cut off, hoped encounter their true.
translations.idiomatic: The emperor increasingly grew weary of the fangshi's strange and circuitous words, yet he maintained them without cutting off, hoping to encounter the real thing.

sentences.zh: 自此之後，方士言神祠者彌眾，然其效可睹矣。

translations.literal: From this after, fangshi spoke divine sacrifices ones increasingly numerous, yet their effect could be seen already.
translations.idiomatic: From this time on, fangshi who spoke of divine sacrifices became increasingly numerous, yet their effectiveness could be seen.

sentences.zh: 太史公曰：余從巡祭天地諸神名山川而封禪焉。

translations.literal: Grand Historian said: I followed toured sacrificed heaven earth various gods famous mountains rivers and feng shan there.
translations.idiomatic: The Grand Historian says: 'I followed along in touring and sacrificing to heaven and earth, the various gods, famous mountains and rivers, and performed feng and shan.'

sentences.zh: 入壽宮侍祠神語，究觀方士祠官之意，於是退而論次自古以來用事於鬼神者，具見其表裏。

translations.literal: Entered Shou Palace attended sacrificial divine conversations, thoroughly observed fangshi sacrifice officials intentions, therefore withdrew and arranged in order from ancient times since those who had affairs with ghosts spirits ones, fully saw their outward inward.
translations.idiomatic: I entered the Shou Palace and attended the sacrificial conversations with the gods, thoroughly observed the intentions of fangshi and sacrifice officials, then withdrew and arranged in order those who had affairs with ghosts and spirits since ancient times, fully seeing their outward and inward aspects.

sentences.zh: 後有君子，得以覽焉。

translations.literal: Later have gentlemen, can examine there.
translations.idiomatic: Future gentlemen may examine it.

sentences.zh: 若至俎豆珪幣之詳，獻酬之禮，則有司存。

translations.literal: If reached zu dou gui bi details, offering responding rites, then officials preserve.
translations.idiomatic: As for the details of zu vessels, dou vessels, gui scepters, and bi currency, the rites of offering and responding, then the officials preserve them.
